comment: Very dishonest company. I bought premium version cross platform. I changed mobile phone and i cannot get but the free version and the one on my pc doesnt work because ut says i have used too many devices. I have contacted them several times but they never get back to me. Dont buy it!

author: Ana Starinskaja
comment: Used to be very good untill the last update that not only interrupted my work, logged me off, erased my unsaved file, made it totally unrecoverable, but also eliminated the most needed function for my project. I'm not able to move the inserted pictures with drag and drop. And that's called improvement??!! I would give 0 stars now if I could.

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello Ana,

We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a problem with OfficeSuite. 

Please contact us at: support@mobisystems.com providing more details and screenshots, if applicable, so that we can help.

We take pride in our products and are constantly working to improve and make them better.

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

comment: This app is garbage equivalent to EA games. Doesn't let you do didly till you upgrade to premium. I can't remove it from my device and is just taking up space that could be used for useful apps.

author: V Tangram
comment: Garbage.  Tried to open a document to upload to PC while sitting in a quiet office and a BLARING AD PLAYED.  Thank you devs, for almost getting me in trouble. Assholes.

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello V Tangram,

We are sorry you feel this way, but in order to provide free versions of our products in today's competitive market, we need to include advertising and limit some features.

You always have the option to upgrade to OfficeSuite Pro or Premium to unlock more features and also remove advertising.

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

author: James Carter
comment: I bought, and paid for, this app; plus Fonts, plus Dictionary+ Other Add Ons!!! And now I See that there is a MOBI Pro? Well, what is this that I paid for, if it is not PRO? Guess I am part of the reason that you are doing so well in GSMA Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, huh?  What Am I, Chopped Liver?!!! Suggest a Rapid Explanation, -jc

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello James,

OfficeSuite has two paid versions. Pro is a one-time payment while Premium is subscription based and offers cross-platform use of OfficeSuite. 

For more information visit the OfficeSuite Pro listing in Google Play and for Premium visit our website: officesuitenow.com

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

title: What's The Diff? MOBI?
